name: Jurassic Dash
description:
//IT IS HIGHLY RECOMMENDED TO PLAY IN FULL SCREEN//

The game

You wake up to the sound of your prehistoric home cave collapsing all around you! Find the special nest to escape the cave while collecting valuable eggs to upgrade your dino. Try to get the highest score out of all your friends! 

Controls 

A -- Move left

D -- Move right

W -- to Jump

(Mouse Left Click for all menu buttons)

Tips

- Touching Meteors (big rocks) and falling in lava will damage you.

-  The hearts at the top left are your health and if your health reaches 0 you die. If you stay in the wall of death for too long you die. 

-If your score turns light blue you have beat your highscore, try to stay alive!

Development

This was my first every game jam-like competition and I spent a total of 16 hours throughout 3 days creating this game. Because the competition started on a Monday I also had school on the 3 days I had to make this game so I ended up not doing much school work :). I made it in Unity, the art I made in Piskel and the music and sound effects are a free public asset on the asset store. 

Sound: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/68228

Music: https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/78911

Me 

I am a 17 year old student in Canada. Ive been doing game development, with afocus on programming, for 5 years. As of lately I've  been getting more serious anoint it. This game will be going on the iOS App Store and possibly Android in the future after major updates. I am also currently working on another game called Lost Dungeons which is a 16 BIT dungeon crawler.
